death.attack.death_potion: %1$s thought it was a great idea to drink a potion with 'Death' in the name.
mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right Click on Map Device to Use
item.patchouli.age_of_exile_guide.name: Age of Exile Guidebook
mmorpg.word.alchemydesc: Combine the alchemist's mortar with ingredients to produce potions. Potions have strong but short effects.
mmorpg.word.armorcraftingdesc: Combine an Armorer's Cloth with a piece of armor and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.blacksmithdesc: Blacksmithing turns stones and minerals into useful tools.
mmorpg.word.cantusemoreof: Can't use more than 1 ingredient of that type.
mmorpg.word.cookingdesc: Combine the Cook's pot with ingredients to produce foods. Food has a long lasting effect.
mmorpg.word.corruptedexplanation1: Use Orb of Purification to clear corruption.
mmorpg.word.corruptedexplanation2: Item won't provide any stats until purified.
mmorpg.word.explorationdesc: Exploration is all about treasure finding! Looting chests out in the world gives not only loot and favor, but also exploration experience. Completing minecraft advancements also rewards experience.
mmorpg.word.failedbutsafe: Upgrade failed but the Protection Scroll effect safeguarded the item.
mmorpg.word.farmingdesc: Farming is the process of turning purified essence into edible crops. These crops can then be used for alchemy or cooking.
mmorpg.word.fishingdesc: Fishing is the simplest profession. You catch fish and get experience. Sometimes you might get important materials like ink, which is used in other professions. You can also catch different fish in different biomes.
mmorpg.word.gearhasdata: The used gear has stats already
mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pickup.
mmorpg.word.inscribingdesc: Combine the Scribe's Fabric with ingredients to produce scrolls. Scrolls buff everyone around you for a short duration.
mmorpg.word.jewelcraftingdesc: Combine a Jeweler's Tool with a ring or necklace and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.miningdesc: Mining is one of the basic gatherer professions. You gain experience for mining ores and smelting them. When mining ores, there's a small chance Mystical Stones pop up. They have various uses.
mmorpg.word.mustbespellgem: Must be a Spell Gem Item
mmorpg.word.nogear: This recipe requires gear as ingredient
mmorpg.word.passivedesc: Casted when hit by mob at low health.
mmorpg.word.repairkit2: Craft with fuel mat to charge.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify first item in inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.salvagingdesc: Salvaging is about turning useless gear into essence, a material that's useful for many things.
mmorpg.word.savesnamedorenchanted: Doesn't auto salvage named or enchanted items.
mmorpg.word.socketlvlisnthigherthaniteml: Socket lvl not higher than gear lvl
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An Identify Scroll can reveal it.
mmorpg.word.weaponcraftingdesc: Combine a Weapon Crafter's Hammer with a weapon and some materials to enchant that item with stats.
mmorpg.word.wrongingredient: You can't use use that item in this recipe.
mmorpg.word.wrongrecipeingredient: That ingredient isn't usable in this profession.

mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Age of Exile [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
mmorpg.tips.favor: You gain favor when opening chests found in structures for the first time. Favor is expended when you gain loot. At zero favor, you can't obtain great loot and your experience gain is lowered!
mmorpg.tips.foodtoregen: You won't regenerate health or mana if your hunger bar is low.
mmorpg.tips.proffslvling: There are many professions and leveling them provide benefits, including bonus experience when killing mobs!
mmorpg.tips.proffwiki: Most professions have wiki sections, like what ores reward mining experience! Check it in the profession screen!
mmorpg.tips.wiki: There is an in-game wiki! It shows useful things like what unique gears exist, how to get them, what level mobs are in which dimensions and so on! Go check it out in the Main Hub! (Default key: H)
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls explicit numbers on a gear.
item.mmorpg.currency.orb_of_transmutatio: Transform common item into higher rarity.
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity.
spell.desc.arrow_storm: Shoot out arrows in an arc, dealing [calc:arrow_storm] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage
spell.desc.astral_totem: Summon a totem which restores [calc:totem_mana] mana to allies around it.
spell.desc.backflip: Jump back and gain Cleanse for a short time.
spell.desc.banish: Summon a Magic circle that banishes enemies in the area, levitating them for a certain duration and applying a debuff.
spell.desc.black_hole: Summon a dark sphere that attracts nearby enemies to it, dealing [calc:black_hole]§d⚜ Elemental§7 Damage when it expires.
spell.desc.charge: Charge in a direction, stopping upon first enemy hit to deal [calc:charge] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage in radius.
spell.desc.charged_bolt: Shoot a charged arrow that goes through enemies and deals [calc:charged_bolt] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage in radius and slows.
spell.desc.chill_eruption: Detonate every enemy affected by Chill to deal [calc:frost_nova] §b❉ Ice§7 Damage
spell.desc.chilling_field: Freeze area of sight, applying chill and damaging enemies for [calc:chilling_field]§b❉ Ice§7 Damage every second.
spell.desc.conjure_ender_chest: Allows you to access your Ender Chest from any place.
spell.desc.curse_of_agony: Curse enemies with Curse of Agony and deal [calc:curse] §d⚜ Elemental§7 Damage
spell.desc.curse_of_despair: Curse enemies with Curse of Despair and deal [calc:curse] §d⚜ Elemental§7 Damage
spell.desc.curse_of_weak: Curse enemies with Curse of Weakness and deal [calc:curse] §d⚜ Elemental§7 Damage
spell.desc.dash: Dash in your direction and gain slowfall.
spell.desc.entangling_seed: Throw out a seed that explodes and petrifies enemies.
spell.desc.execute: Slash enemies in front of you for [calc:execute] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage
spell.desc.explosive_arrow: Shoot an arrow that does [calc:explosive_arrow] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage around it
spell.desc.fire_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal [calc:ranger_trap]§c☀ Fire§7 Damage damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.flame_strike: Strike enemies in front for [calc:flame_strike] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage
spell.desc.frost_nova: Explode with frost around you, dealing [calc:frost_nova] §b❉ Ice§7 Damage to nearby enemies.
spell.desc.frost_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal [calc:ranger_trap]§b❉ Ice§7 Damage damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.gong_strike: Bash enemies around you for [calc:gong_strike] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage
spell.desc.guard_totem: Summon a totem which gives [calc:totem_guard] shield to allies around it.
spell.desc.healing_aura: Heal allies around you for [calc:healing_aura] health
spell.desc.heart_of_ice: Heal allies around you for [calc:heart_of_ice] health
spell.desc.hunter_potion: Drink a potion, healing you for [calc:hunter_pot_heal] health
spell.desc.jump_field: Summon a Jump Field, stepping on it will propel you upwards at high speeds.
spell.desc.levitation: Levitate in the air, but you can't move around besides upwards.
spell.desc.mage_circle: Summon a Magic Circle. Standing in it provides you a buff. After a certain duration you will be teleported to its location.
spell.desc.magic_projectile: Throw out a magical spark, dealing [calc:magic_projectile] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage
spell.desc.mark_for_death: Mark your target for death, making them more vulnerable to damage.
spell.desc.meteor: Summon a meteor that falls from the sky, dealing [calc:meteor] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage
spell.desc.night_vision: Give Night Vision to allies around you.
spell.desc.poison_arrow: Shoot an arrow, dealing [calc:poison_arrow] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage around it and poisoning enemies.
spell.desc.poison_cloud: Erupt with poisonous gas, dealing [calc:frost_nova] §2✿ Poison§7 Damage to nearby enemies and applying Poison.
spell.desc.poison_trap: Throw out a trap that stays on the ground and activates when an enemy approaches to deal [calc:ranger_trap]§2✿ Poison§7 Damage damage in area around itself.
spell.desc.pull: Pull enemies in area to you, dealing [calc:pull] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage and slowing them.
spell.desc.refresh: Refreshes all your spell cooldowns by 1 minute.
spell.desc.rejuv_totem: Summon a totem which restores [calc:totem_heal] health to allies around it.
spell.desc.shooting_star: Shoots a star that heals allies for [calc:shooting_star] health on hit.
spell.desc.shout_warn: Let out a warning shout, giving a [calc:shout_warn] Shield to all nearby allies.
spell.desc.shred: Slash all nearby enemies, dealing [calc:shred] §6✦ Physical§7 Damage damage and reducing their defenses.
spell.desc.smoke_bomb: Throw out a smoke bomb, blinding enemies and reducing threat.
spell.desc.song_of_perseverance: Give a stack of Perseverance to all allies around you.
spell.desc.song_of_valor: Give a stack of Valor to all allies around you.
spell.desc.song_of_vigor: Give a stack of Vigor to all allies around you.
spell.desc.taunt: Shout, making enemies nearby want to attack you. Generates [calc:taunt] threat.
spell.desc.teleport: Teleport yourself in the direction you're looking at.
spell.desc.the_hunt: Gain Night vision and set all enemies around you to glow.
spell.desc.tidal_strike: Strike enemies in front of you for [calc:tidal_strike] §b❉ Ice§7 Damage
spell.desc.water_breath: Give Water Breathing to allies around you.
spell.desc.whirlwind: Strike enemies around you for [calc:whirlwind] §c☀ Fire§7 Damage. Scales with attack speed.
spell.desc.wish: Heal allies around you for [calc:healing_aura] health
mmorpg.stat.skill_xp: Increases xp gain of that profession/skill
mmorpg.stat_desc.accuracy: Increases your chance to hit, low accuracy also causes crits to fail. Specifically it decreases opponent's chance to dodge
mmorpg.stat_desc.agility: Determines your total: Energy, Energy Regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_all_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to DEX, INT STR, VIT, WIL, AGI.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_earth_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_elemental_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_fire_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_physical_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_water_damage: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_dmg: Affects dmg done by area of effect abilities. Think meteor or other large aoe spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases physical damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.axe_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood: Blood is a unique resource that works like mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.bow_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.cast_speed: Affects amount of time needed to cast spells. If the spell is instant, it reduces the cooldown
mmorpg.stat_desc.cd_ticks: Reduces spell cooldown by x ticks
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply attack damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.crossbow_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.curse_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_reflected: Deals a % of damage you receive to enemies that attack you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_shield: Decreases that amount of damage from every attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Determines your total: Physical Damage, Dodge Rating
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_taken_to_mana: % of damage taken is restored to mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_to_living: Living entities are not undead ones.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dot_dmg: Increases dmg of effects that do damage over time, like burn
mmorpg.stat_desc.earth_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds x element damage on weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_axe_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_bow_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_crossbow_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_pene: Ignores that much resists, it works as subtraction.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops X percent damage of that element
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_scepter_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_staff_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_sword_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_trident_damage: Increases elemental damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: More exp gained for killing mobs of that tier.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases Dmg for that element by a percent but decreases dmg from all other elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy: Energy is used to attack with a weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.extra_mob_drops: Mobs with this stat drop extra loot when slain.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fire_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.global_critical_hit: Chance to multiply attack damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_effect_on_self: Increases spell related heals on you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_aoe: Spell aoe effects will be larger
mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_leech: Affects all resource leech stats like: onhit, leech dmg, on kill restore etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.increased_quantity: Increases amount of loot found in chests
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: Spell Damage, Fire Resist, Ice Resist, Poison Resist
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_dmg_received: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items found in chests.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Restores this much every few seconds.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_shield: Percent of damage is absorbed by mana. This effect only works if mana is not less than 50 percent capacity. Mana shield is applied after magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.melee_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.melee_dmg_received: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.movement_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.non_crit_damage: If not a Critical, multiply by x
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.piercing_projectiles: Makes spell pierce enemies and keep on
mmorpg.stat_desc.potion_strength: Increases effectiveness of instant potions that restore mana and health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.proj_dmg_received: Affects projectile damage, includes projectile spells like fireballs, and ranged basic attacks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.projectile_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.projectile_damage: Affects projectile damage, includes projectile spells like fireballs, and ranged basic attacks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ranged_dmg: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ranged_dmg_received: Magic damage are mage spells, like fireball.
mmorpg.stat_desc.scepter_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.shield_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.shield_duration: Boosts the shield amount from spells and other sources.
mmorpg.stat_desc.shield_strength: Boosts the shield amount you get from spells and other sources.
mmorpg.stat_desc.shout_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.song_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_accuracy: Increases your chance to hit, low accuracy also causes crits to fail. Specifically it decreases opponent's chance to dodge
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_critical_hit: Chance to multiply attack damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG of all spells no matter the element
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_dodge: Chance to ignore magic spell damage. Melee and ranged type spells don't count.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_earth_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_elemental_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_fire_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_lifesteal: Restore % of spell damage as health.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_water_damage: Increases damage of spells of that element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.staff_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.staff_spell_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Determines your total: Physical Damage, Armor
mmorpg.stat_desc.sword_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.technique_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.threat_generated: Modifies amount of threat you generate. Mobs attack targets with highest threat.
mmorpg.stat_desc.totem_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.trap_cdr: Reduces spell cooldown of spells with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.trident_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.turn_phys_to_ele: Turns % of phys atk dmg into ele
mmorpg.stat_desc.vitality: Determines your total: Health, Health Regen
mmorpg.stat_desc.water_dot_damage: Fire damage over time increases damage of burn, for example.
mmorpg.stat_desc.wisdom: Determines your total: Mana, Mana Regen
